security.title: Security Settings
security.passwordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match

security.updateFailedRetry: Failed to change password. Please try again.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all related data. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteAccountFailedRetry: Failed to delete account. Please check your password and try again.
dangerZone.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and will delete all your data.
dangerZone.doubleConfirm: Please confirm again: After deleting your account, all your conversation history and personal data will be permanently lost.
dangerZone.enterPassword: Please enter your password to confirm the deletion:
dangerZone.clearHistoryDescription: Delete all conversation records and messages. This action cannot be undone, but will not affect your account.
dangerZone.clearHistoryFailed: Failed to clear history. Please try again.
dangerZone.confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear all history? This action cannot be undone and will delete all your conversation records.
